title: Can not connect before champ select/ Receiving dodge penalties
body:
Hello everyone, is anyone else having similar issues that may be able to shine some light on the situation?


When trying to find games within both legacy and beta client, I experience a dialog that tells me I have disconnected allowing me to exit.  The odd thing is it seems to be around the same time I generally connect to games.  From this I am receiving dodge penalties that sadly I have never actually dodged.

In response to this I ran the hextech repair tool, and sadly it hasn't been able to fix this problem. 

So please anyone that has found a fix for this please let me know!
{{item:3070}} 

Trying to reconnect picture: [Reconnect](http://pasteboard.co/L3BZuuwz0.png)
Dodge penalty: [Penalty](http://pasteboard.co/L3Dk1iYRk.png)

replies.body: This just started happening to me today, I have restarted PC and verified my connection has been stable low MS and can continue to watch live streams while this happens to verify my connection isnt dropping.
Second this^ I was able to watch the games today no internal connection problems.

You might be having network issues transitioning into champion select, so you're never really able to get into queue properly.  A traceroute wouldn't really help in this case unless you're already in a game, and you're still logged into the client.  I suggest grabbing the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and use it alongside the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to help troubleshoot.  Make sure to go over each step to help with ruling out possibilities and blocks.  I hope that helps!

Sadly I've ran the hextech repair tool already a few times, I've been poking around the connection issues page also yet I haven't had any success prior to posting on here.   

Thanks for the response, do you suggest I should submit a ticket in the meantime?
